name: Uppercut!
description:
I'm a 23 year old games development student from Plymouth, UK. I'm currently in my 3rd year of university and made this as a part of the Industry Engagement module for the course. I have made several games in the past such as Another F***ing Zombie Game, Endless Wasteland and Block Assault V2.0. If you're interested in my next project, you can follow my twitter at @SplitzDev and check out my portfolio website on my profile page.

CREDITS 

Game Design & Code: Alex Davis

Music: Professor Kliq

Voice Acting: Announcer, Ryker & R3B3L- Alex Davis, Kera - Josie Davis

Models & Animations: www.mixamo.com
